content: Create new folder structure for organized codebase
Move video-related files to Views/Video/ folder
Move marker-related files to Views/Markers/ folder
Move settings-related files to Views/Settings/ folder
Move keyboard-related files to Views/Keyboard/ folder
Move feedback views to Views/Feedback/ folder
Move performance views to Views/Performance/ folder
Create and move files to ViewModels/ folder
Create Extensions/ folder and move extension files
Create App/ folder and move main app files
Create Utils/Performance/ folder and reorganize performance utilities
Split SettingsView.swift into separate view and view model files
Split Marker.swift into separate model files
Split Project.swift into separate model files
Update import statements in all affected files
Test build to ensure all files are properly included
